TopicTitle: How to have a linkable image

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to have a clickable image in my posts.  This was fairly easy to do in the old forum, but I can't figure out how to do it.

This is the html code which I'm trying to replicate:

<a href="https://www.patreon.com/linuxgurugamer">
<img src="http://bayerfamily.net/Patreon.png">
</>
Insert the image normally and double-click on it in the editor to add a link.

Two easy ways:

- Insert image as usual, then Ctrl-RMB it, "Edit Image", and there's a field for inserting an URL.

- Insert the link, highlight it, then Insert Other Media > Insert image from URL.
